@usedefaults

{{timestamp}}

{{aysblueprints ayspath:$$ayspath}}

{% if error is defined %}
Error : ${error}
{% else %}
{% for bpname, bp in data.items() -%}
    h4. ${bpname}
    {{accordion:
        - title: ${bp.title}
          label_color: ${bp.label_color}
          label_icon: ${bp.icon}
          content: |
              ${bp.content}
          label_content: ${bp.label_content}
          code: True
    }}
{% endfor %}
{% endif %}
@colend
